SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Race

java.lang.Object
cycling.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Race extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single race stores a list of ID's of associated riders and stages which should be kept accurate
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the Race - should be unique
      Returns:
      String of the name of the race

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets the name of the Race - should not be null, empty, over 30 chars or contain whitespace
      Parameters:
      newName - String new name that abides by rules of name

    • getDesc

      public String getDesc()
      Gets the description of race
      Returns:
      String, may be much longer than name

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String newDesc)
      Sets the description of the race
      Parameters:
      newDesc - String, not restricted by size or contents

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID of race, each race should have a unique ID
      Returns:
      int unique ID of race

    • setID

      public void setID(int newId)
      Sets ID of race, should be unique and only be set at race creation to avoid issues
      Parameters:
      newId - unique int ID number to identify race

    • getStages

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStages()
      Gets ArrayList of all the stages currently contained within the race ArrayList should be sorted from lowest to highest so that binary search functions correctly
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Integers, each of which are IDs of stages

    • addStage

      public void addStage(Integer stageId)
      Adds a stage to a race
      Parameters:
      stageId - int ID of the stage to be added to the race, the same ID should not be set multiple times

    • removeStage

      public void removeStage(int stageId)
      Removes a stage from a race - checkpoints and results of stage should also be removed if stage is being removed from system
      Parameters:
      stageId - int unique ID of stage

    • getRiders

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRiders()
      Gets list of all riders that have taken part in a race
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Integers, each are a unique ID of a rider

    • setRiders

      public void setRiders(ArrayList<Integer> NewRiders)
      Replaces the entire list of riders - should only be used when resetting entire rider list, list should be sorted from lowest to highest ID value To just add or remove a single rider, use addRider(int) and respectively
      Parameters:
      NewRiders - ArrayList of Integer values of rider IDs

    • addRider

      public void addRider(int riderId)
      Adds a single rider to the race, automatically sorts, should not get duplicates
      Parameters:
      riderId - int unique ID value of a rider to add

    • removeRider

      public void removeRider(int riderId)
      Removes a single rider from the race. Race should also be removed from Rider
      Parameters:
      riderId - unique ID value of rider to remove from race

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
